name: Coolant Catastrophe
description:
Overview

You are a duck. They are robots. Hit them and make them sad and dead and move through the levels until you make it to the end and become a pro duck gamer.

How to Play

  • WASD or Arrows to move
  • Spacebar to Jump
  • Spacebar again in the air to multi jump (infinitely) if you have the boots
  • Mouse click to shoot (if you have the laser eye)
  • "P" to restart the level in case you mess up

This be a game created by Zyjin and Boiman for the Godot Wild Game Jam #53.

NOTE: We had everything working and then it breaks when trying to build exe's and we don't know why. The only thing that works for sure is the Windows ZIP.
